text: I'm looking at a method to migrate Wordpress blogs with their featured images. Has anyone found a method for this? This looks hopeful. <https://www.impactbnd.com/blog/how-to-move-your-blog-from-wordpress-to-HubSpot>

Hi <@US6NZB1SN>. I may be able to help - we have some experimental migration tools that we're in the process of beta testing. Can you please DM me a link to the blog you're interested in migrating? Thanks!
